title: Apple Music, iMessage, and other services are currently down for users across the world
content:
Apple Music, iMessage, Maps, TV, Fitness Plus, iCloud, App Store, and other services are currently down for users across the globe. Those trying to access online content from these services will have to wait until the servers go back up. At the time of writing, the company’s system status website still states that everything is

The post Apple Music, iMessage, and other services are currently down for users across the world appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Some Apple services are currently down for users across the world. These include Music, TV, Maps, App Store, and many more.
